title: Cloud Text-to-Speech API - 創建語音音頻文件
abstract:
# Cloud Text-to-Speech API - 創建語音音頻文件
您可以使用 Text-to-Speech 將字詞和句子轉換爲自然人類語音的 base64 編碼音頻數據。然後，您可以通過對 base64 數據進行解碼，將音頻數據轉換爲 MP3 等可播放的音頻文件。Text-to-Speech 接受的輸入數據包括原始文本或 [語音合成標記語言 (SSML)](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/ssml?hl=zh-cn) 。
本文檔介紹如何使用 Text-to-Speech 從文本或 SSML 輸入創建音頻文件。如果您不熟悉語音合成或 SSML 等概念，建議您閱讀文章 [Text-to-Speech 基礎知識](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/basics?hl=zh-cn) 。
這些示例要求您已安裝並初始化 Google Cloud CLI。如需瞭解如何設置 gcloud CLI，請參閱 [向 TTS 進行身份驗證](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/authentication?hl=zh-cn) 。
content:
## 將文本轉換爲合成語音音頻 以下代碼示例演示如何將字符串轉換爲音頻數據。 您可以通過多種方式配置語音合成的輸出，包括 [選擇獨特的語音](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/voices?hl=zh-cn) 或 [調製輸出的音高、音量、語速和採樣率](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/basics?hl=zh-cn#audio-config) 。 **注意** ：有關如何使用 [Neural2 語音](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/voice-types?hl=zh-cn) 的具體細節，請參閱 [端點文檔](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/endpoints?hl=zh-cn) 。 如需瞭解完整的詳細信息，請參閱 [text:synthesize](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/reference/rest/v1beta1/text/synthesize?hl=zh-cn) API 端點。 要從文本合成音頻，請向 [text:synthesize](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/reference/rest/v1beta1/text/synthesize?hl=zh-cn) 端點發出 HTTP POST 請求。在 POST 請求正文的 `voice` 配置部分指定要合成的語音類型，在 `input` 部分的 `text` 字段中指定要合成的文本，並在 `audioConfig` 部分指定要創建的音頻類型。 以下代碼段將向 [text:synthesize](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/reference/rest/v1beta1/text/synthesize?hl=zh-cn) 端點發送合成請求並將結果保存到名爲 `synthesize-text.txt` 的文件中。 將 `` 替換爲您的項目 ID。 ``` curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $(gcloud auth print-access-token)" \  -H "x-goog-user-project: PROJECT_ID" \  -H "Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8" \  --data "{    'input':{      'text':'Android is a mobile operating system developed by Google,         based on the Linux kernel and designed primarily for         touchscreen mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets.'    },    'voice':{      'languageCode':'en-gb',      'name':'en-GB-Standard-A',      'ssmlGender':'FEMALE'    },    'audioConfig':{      'audioEncoding':'MP3'    }  }" "https://texttospeech.googleapis.com/v1/text:synthesize" > synthesize-text.txt ``` Text-to-Speech API 將返回包含在 JSON 輸出中的 base64 編碼數據格式的合成音頻。 `synthesize-text.txt` 文件中的 JSON 輸出類似於以下代碼片段。 ``` { "audioContent": "//NExAASCCIIAAhEAGAAEMW4kAYPnwwIKw/BBTpwTvB+IAxIfghUfW.." } ``` 要將 Text-to-Speech API 的合成結果解碼爲 MP3 音頻文件，請從 `synthesize-text.txt` 文件所在的目錄運行以下命令。 ``` cat synthesize-text.txt | grep 'audioContent' | \sed 's|audioContent| |' | tr -d '\n ":{},' > tmp.txt && \base64 tmp.txt --decode > synthesize-text-audio.mp3 && \rm tmp.txt ```如需瞭解如何安裝和使用 Text-to-Speech 客戶端庫，請參閱 [Text-to-Speech 客戶端庫](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/libraries?hl=zh-cn) 。如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [Text-to-Speech Go API 參考文檔](https://cloud.google.com/go/docs/reference/cloud.google.com/go/texttospeech/latest/apiv1?hl=zh-cn) 。 如需向 Text-to-Speech 進行身份驗證，請設置應用默認憑據。 如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [爲本地開發環境設置身份驗證](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/provide-credentials-adc?hl=zh-cn#local-dev) 。 [在 GitHub 上查看](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/golang-samples/blob/HEAD/texttospeech/synthesize_text/synthesize_text.go) ``` // SynthesizeText synthesizes plain text and saves the output to outputFile.func SynthesizeText(w io.Writer, text, outputFile string) error {        ctx := context.Background()        client, err := texttospeech.NewClient(ctx)        if err != nil {                return err        }        defer client.Close()        req := texttospeechpb.SynthesizeSpeechRequest{                Input: &texttospeechpb.SynthesisInput{                        InputSource: &texttospeechpb.SynthesisInput_Text{Text: text},                },                // Note: the voice can also be specified by name.                // Names of voices can be retrieved with client.ListVoices().                Voice: &texttospeechpb.VoiceSelectionParams{                        LanguageCode: "en-US",                        SsmlGender:   texttospeechpb.SsmlVoiceGender_FEMALE,                },                AudioConfig: &texttospeechpb.AudioConfig{                        AudioEncoding: texttospeechpb.AudioEncoding_MP3,                },        }        resp, err := client.SynthesizeSpeech(ctx, &req)        if err != nil {                return err        }        err = ioutil.WriteFile(outputFile, resp.AudioContent, 0644)        if err != nil {                return err        }        fmt.Fprintf(w, "Audio content written to file: %v\n", outputFile)        return nil} ```如需瞭解如何安裝和使用 Text-to-Speech 客戶端庫，請參閱 [Text-to-Speech 客戶端庫](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/libraries?hl=zh-cn) 。如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [Text-to-Speech Java API 參考文檔](https://cloud.google.com/java/docs/reference/google-cloud-texttospeech/latest/overview?hl=zh-cn) 。 如需向 Text-to-Speech 進行身份驗證，請設置應用默認憑據。 如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [爲本地開發環境設置身份驗證](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/provide-credentials-adc?hl=zh-cn#local-dev) 。 [在 GitHub 上查看](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples/blob/HEAD/texttospeech/snippets/src/main/java/com/example/texttospeech/SynthesizeText.java) ``` /** * Demonstrates using the Text to Speech client to synthesize text or ssml. * * @param text the raw text to be synthesized. (e.g., "Hello there!") * @throws Exception on TextToSpeechClient Errors. */public static ByteString synthesizeText(String text) throws Exception {  // Instantiates a client  try (TextToSpeechClient textToSpeechClient = TextToSpeechClient.create()) {    // Set the text input to be synthesized    SynthesisInput input = SynthesisInput.newBuilder().setText(text).build();    // Build the voice request    VoiceSelectionParams voice =        VoiceSelectionParams.newBuilder()            .setLanguageCode("en-US") // languageCode = "en_us"            .setSsmlGender(SsmlVoiceGender.FEMALE) // ssmlVoiceGender = SsmlVoiceGender.FEMALE            .build();    // Select the type of audio file you want returned    AudioConfig audioConfig =        AudioConfig.newBuilder()            .setAudioEncoding(AudioEncoding.MP3) // MP3 audio.            .build();    // Perform the text-to-speech request    SynthesizeSpeechResponse response =        textToSpeechClient.synthesizeSpeech(input, voice, audioConfig);    // Get the audio contents from the response    ByteString audioContents = response.getAudioContent();    // Write the response to the output file.    try (OutputStream out = new FileOutputStream("output.mp3")) {      out.write(audioContents.toByteArray());      System.out.println("Audio content written to file \"output.mp3\"");      return audioContents;    }  }} ```如需瞭解如何安裝和使用 Text-to-Speech 客戶端庫，請參閱 [Text-to-Speech 客戶端庫](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/libraries?hl=zh-cn) 。如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [Text-to-Speech Node.js API 參考文檔](https://cloud.google.com/nodejs/docs/reference/text-to-speech/latest?hl=zh-cn) 。 如需向 Text-to-Speech 進行身份驗證，請設置應用默認憑據。 如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [爲本地開發環境設置身份驗證](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/provide-credentials-adc?hl=zh-cn#local-dev) 。 [在 GitHub 上查看](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/nodejs-docs-samples/blob/HEAD/texttospeech/synthesize.js) ``` const textToSpeech = require('@google-cloud/text-to-speech');const fs = require('fs');const util = require('util');const client = new textToSpeech.TextToSpeechClient();/** * TODO(developer): Uncomment the following lines before running the sample. */// const text = 'Text to synthesize, eg. hello';// const outputFile = 'Local path to save audio file to, e.g. output.mp3';const request = {  input: {text: text},  voice: {languageCode: 'en-US', ssmlGender: 'FEMALE'},  audioConfig: {audioEncoding: 'MP3'},};const [response] = await client.synthesizeSpeech(request);const writeFile = util.promisify(fs.writeFile);await writeFile(outputFile, response.audioContent, 'binary');console.log(`Audio content written to file: ${outputFile}`); ```如需瞭解如何安裝和使用 Text-to-Speech 客戶端庫，請參閱 [Text-to-Speech 客戶端庫](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/libraries?hl=zh-cn) 。如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [Text-to-Speech Python API 參考文檔](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/texttospeech/latest?hl=zh-cn) 。 如需向 Text-to-Speech 進行身份驗證，請設置應用默認憑據。 如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [爲本地開發環境設置身份驗證](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/provide-credentials-adc?hl=zh-cn#local-dev) 。 [在 GitHub 上查看](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/python-docs-samples/blob/HEAD/texttospeech/snippets/synthesize_text.py) ``` def synthesize_text(text):    """Synthesizes speech from the input string of text."""    from google.cloud import texttospeech    client = texttospeech.TextToSpeechClient()    input_text = texttospeech.SynthesisInput(text=text)    # Note: the voice can also be specified by name.    # Names of voices can be retrieved with client.list_voices().    voice = texttospeech.VoiceSelectionParams(        language_code="en-US",        name="en-US-Standard-C",        ssml_gender=texttospeech.SsmlVoiceGender.FEMALE,    )    audio_config = texttospeech.AudioConfig(        audio_encoding=texttospeech.AudioEncoding.MP3    )    response = client.synthesize_speech(        request={"input": input_text, "voice": voice, "audio_config": audio_config}    )    # The response's audio_content is binary.    with open("output.mp3", "wb") as out:        out.write(response.audio_content)        print('Audio content written to file "output.mp3"') ```No preface **C#** ：請按照客戶端庫頁面上的 [C# 設置說明](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/libraries?hl=zh-cn) 操作，然後訪問 [.NET 的 Text-to-Speech 參考文檔](https://googleapis.github.io/google-cloud-dotnet/docs/Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1/index.html) 。 **PHP** ：請按照客戶端庫頁面上的 [PHP 設置說明](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/libraries?hl=zh-cn) 操作，然後訪問 [PHP 的 Text-to-Speech 參考文檔](https://cloud.google.com/php/docs/reference/cloud-text-to-speech/latest?hl=zh-cn) 。 **Ruby** ：請按照客戶端庫頁面上的 [Ruby 設置說明](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/libraries?hl=zh-cn) 操作，然後訪問 [Ruby 的 Text-to-Speech 參考文檔](https://googleapis.dev/ruby/google-cloud-text_to_speech/latest/Google/Cloud/TextToSpeech/V1.html) 。 ## 將 SSML 轉換爲合成語音音頻 在您的音頻合成請求中使用 SSML 可以生成更像自然人類語音的音頻。具體來說，SSML 可以讓您更精細地控制音頻輸出如何表示語音中的暫停或音頻中日期、時間、首字母縮寫詞和縮寫詞的發音。 如需詳細瞭解 Text-to-Speech API 支持的 SSML 元素，請參閱 [SSML 參考](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/ssml?hl=zh-cn) 。 如需瞭解完整的詳細信息，請參閱 [text:synthesize](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/reference/rest/v1beta1/text/synthesize?hl=zh-cn) API 端點。 要從 SSML 合成音頻，請向 [text:synthesize](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/reference/rest/v1beta1/text/synthesize?hl=zh-cn) 端點發出 HTTP POST 請求。在 POST 請求正文的 `voice` 配置部分指定要合成的語音類型，在 `input` 部分的 `ssml` 字段中指定要合成的 SSML，並在 `audioConfig` 部分指定要創建的音頻類型。 以下代碼段將向 [text:synthesize](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/reference/rest/v1beta1/text/synthesize?hl=zh-cn) 端點發送合成請求並將結果保存到名爲 `synthesize-ssml.txt` 的文件中。 將 `` 替換爲您的項目 ID。 ``` curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $(gcloud auth print-access-token)" \  -H "x-goog-user-project: PROJECT_ID" \  -H "Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8" --data "{    'input':{     'ssml':'The SSML standard          is defined by the W3C.'    },    'voice':{      'languageCode':'en-us',      'name':'en-US-Standard-B',      'ssmlGender':'MALE'    },    'audioConfig':{      'audioEncoding':'MP3'    }  }" "https://texttospeech.googleapis.com/v1/text:synthesize" > synthesize-ssml.txt ``` Text-to-Speech API 將返回包含在 JSON 輸出中的 base64 編碼數據格式的合成音頻。 `synthesize-ssml.txt` 文件中的 JSON 輸出類似於以下代碼片段。 ``` { "audioContent": "//NExAASCCIIAAhEAGAAEMW4kAYPnwwIKw/BBTpwTvB+IAxIfghUfW.." } ``` 要將 Text-to-Speech API 的合成結果解碼爲 MP3 音頻文件，請從 `synthesize-ssml.txt` 文件所在的目錄運行以下命令。 ``` cat synthesize-ssml.txt | grep 'audioContent' | \sed 's|audioContent| |' | tr -d '\n ":{},' > tmp.txt && \base64 tmp.txt --decode > synthesize-ssml-audio.mp3 && \rm tmp.txt ```如需瞭解如何安裝和使用 Text-to-Speech 客戶端庫，請參閱 [Text-to-Speech 客戶端庫](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/libraries?hl=zh-cn) 。如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [Text-to-Speech Go API 參考文檔](https://cloud.google.com/go/docs/reference/cloud.google.com/go/texttospeech/latest/apiv1?hl=zh-cn) 。 如需向 Text-to-Speech 進行身份驗證，請設置應用默認憑據。 如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [爲本地開發環境設置身份驗證](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/provide-credentials-adc?hl=zh-cn#local-dev) 。 [在 GitHub 上查看](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/golang-samples/blob/HEAD/texttospeech/synthesize_text/synthesize_text.go) ``` // SynthesizeSSML synthesizes ssml and saves the output to outputFile.//// ssml must be well-formed according to:////      https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis///// Example: Hello there.func SynthesizeSSML(w io.Writer, ssml, outputFile string) error {        ctx := context.Background()        client, err := texttospeech.NewClient(ctx)        if err != nil {                return err        }        defer client.Close()        req := texttospeechpb.SynthesizeSpeechRequest{                Input: &texttospeechpb.SynthesisInput{                        InputSource: &texttospeechpb.SynthesisInput_Ssml{Ssml: ssml},                },                // Note: the voice can also be specified by name.                // Names of voices can be retrieved with client.ListVoices().                Voice: &texttospeechpb.VoiceSelectionParams{                        LanguageCode: "en-US",                        SsmlGender:   texttospeechpb.SsmlVoiceGender_FEMALE,                },                AudioConfig: &texttospeechpb.AudioConfig{                        AudioEncoding: texttospeechpb.AudioEncoding_MP3,                },        }        resp, err := client.SynthesizeSpeech(ctx, &req)        if err != nil {                return err        }        err = ioutil.WriteFile(outputFile, resp.AudioContent, 0644)        if err != nil {                return err        }        fmt.Fprintf(w, "Audio content written to file: %v\n", outputFile)        return nil} ```如需瞭解如何安裝和使用 Text-to-Speech 客戶端庫，請參閱 [Text-to-Speech 客戶端庫](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/libraries?hl=zh-cn) 。如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [Text-to-Speech Java API 參考文檔](https://cloud.google.com/java/docs/reference/google-cloud-texttospeech/latest/overview?hl=zh-cn) 。 如需向 Text-to-Speech 進行身份驗證，請設置應用默認憑據。 如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [爲本地開發環境設置身份驗證](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/provide-credentials-adc?hl=zh-cn#local-dev) 。 [在 GitHub 上查看](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples/blob/HEAD/texttospeech/snippets/src/main/java/com/example/texttospeech/SynthesizeText.java) ``` /** * Demonstrates using the Text to Speech client to synthesize text or ssml. * *

Note: ssml must be well-formed according to: (https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis/ * Example: Hello there. * * @param ssml the ssml document to be synthesized. (e.g., "Hello there.';// const outputFile = 'Local path to save audio file to, e.g. output.mp3';const request = {  input: {ssml: ssml},  voice: {languageCode: 'en-US', ssmlGender: 'FEMALE'},  audioConfig: {audioEncoding: 'MP3'},};const [response] = await client.synthesizeSpeech(request);const writeFile = util.promisify(fs.writeFile);await writeFile(outputFile, response.audioContent, 'binary');console.log(`Audio content written to file: ${outputFile}`); ```如需瞭解如何安裝和使用 Text-to-Speech 客戶端庫，請參閱 [Text-to-Speech 客戶端庫](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/libraries?hl=zh-cn) 。如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [Text-to-Speech Python API 參考文檔](https://cloud.google.com/python/docs/reference/texttospeech/latest?hl=zh-cn) 。 如需向 Text-to-Speech 進行身份驗證，請設置應用默認憑據。 如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [爲本地開發環境設置身份驗證](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/provide-credentials-adc?hl=zh-cn#local-dev) 。 [在 GitHub 上查看](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/python-docs-samples/blob/HEAD/texttospeech/snippets/synthesize_text.py) ``` def synthesize_ssml(ssml):    """Synthesizes speech from the input string of ssml.    Note: ssml must be well-formed according to:        https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis/    Example: Hello there.    """    from google.cloud import texttospeech    client = texttospeech.TextToSpeechClient()    input_text = texttospeech.SynthesisInput(ssml=ssml)    # Note: the voice can also be specified by name.    # Names of voices can be retrieved with client.list_voices().    voice = texttospeech.VoiceSelectionParams(        language_code="en-US",        name="en-US-Standard-C",        ssml_gender=texttospeech.SsmlVoiceGender.FEMALE,    )    audio_config = texttospeech.AudioConfig(        audio_encoding=texttospeech.AudioEncoding.MP3    )    response = client.synthesize_speech(        input=input_text, voice=voice, audio_config=audio_config    )    # The response's audio_content is binary.    with open("output.mp3", "wb") as out:        out.write(response.audio_content)        print('Audio content written to file "output.mp3"') ```No preface **C#** ：請按照客戶端庫頁面上的 [C# 設置說明](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/libraries?hl=zh-cn) 操作，然後訪問 [.NET 的 Text-to-Speech 參考文檔](https://googleapis.github.io/google-cloud-dotnet/docs/Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1/index.html) 。 **PHP** ：請按照客戶端庫頁面上的 [PHP 設置說明](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/libraries?hl=zh-cn) 操作，然後訪問 [PHP 的 Text-to-Speech 參考文檔](https://cloud.google.com/php/docs/reference/cloud-text-to-speech/latest?hl=zh-cn) 。 **Ruby** ：請按照客戶端庫頁面上的 [Ruby 設置說明](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/libraries?hl=zh-cn) 操作，然後訪問 [Ruby 的 Text-to-Speech 參考文檔](https://googleapis.dev/ruby/google-cloud-text_to_speech/latest/Google/Cloud/TextToSpeech/V1.html) 。
